code:
var baseUrl=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL;var fetchNoToken=function fetchNoToken(endpoint,data){var method=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'GET';var url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(endpoint);// Ejemplo localhost:3100/api/auth
if(method==='GET'){// Retorna el producto de la petición si es GET.
return fetch(url);}else{return fetch(url,{method:method,headers:{'Content-type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify(data)});};};var fetchToken=function fetchToken(endpoint,data){var method=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:'GET';var url="".concat(baseUrl,"/").concat(endpoint);// Ejemplo localhost:3100/api/auth
var token=localStorage.getItem('token')||'';if(method==='GET'){// Retorna el producto de la petición si es GET.
return fetch(url,{method:method,headers:{'x-token':token}});}else{return fetch(url,{method:method,headers:{'Content-type':'application/json','x-token':token},body:JSON.stringify(data)});};};export{fetchNoToken,fetchToken};
